params._campaignData: Data defining all rules and values of this Crowdtainer instance.

join(address,uint256[]).details: This method is present to make wallet interactions more friendly, by requiring fewer parameters for projects with referral system disabled.Requires IERC20 permit.

params._quantities: Array with the number of units desired for each product.
params._wallet: The wallet that is joining the Crowdtainer. Must be the msg.sender if Crowdtainer owner is address(0x0).

join(address,uint256[],bool,address).details: Requires IERC20 permit.referrer is the wallet address of a previous participant.if `enableReferral` is true, and the user decides to leave after the wallet has been used to claim a discount,       then the full value can't be claimed if deciding to leave the project.A same user is not allowed to increase the order amounts (i.e., by calling join multiple times).      To 'update' an order, the user must first 'leave' then join again with the new values.

params._enableReferral: Informs whether the user would like to be eligible to collect rewards for being referred.
params._quantities: Array with the number of units desired for each product.
params._referrer: Optional referral code to be used to claim a discount.
params._wallet: The wallet that is joining the Crowdtainer. Must be the msg.sender if Crowdtainer owner is address(0x0).

join(address,uint256[],bool,address).notice: Join the Crowdtainer project with optional referral and discount.

documentation.text:
@dev Initializes a Crowdtainer.
 @param _campaignData Data defining all rules and values of this Crowdtainer instance.
